name: Articles of Style - Core Rules
scraping_analysis: WordPress-based but with exceptionally clean HTML structure. Their '/style-guides/' section has 87+ posts with specific measurements and fabric recommendations. No JavaScript rendering needed - all content in initial HTML load. Cloudflare present but only triggers on >5 requests/minute. Their URL pattern is predictable: /post-name/ with consistent metadata. Image URLs follow /wp-content/uploads/YYYY/MM/[descriptive]-size.jpg pattern.

name: Parisian Gentleman - European Rules
scraping_analysis: Minimalist React setup but article content is server-rendered. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 42 detailed posts with exact fabric weights and European sizing standards. No bot protection beyond rate limiting (1 request/2 seconds). Critical insight: their API endpoint /wp-json/wp/v2/posts?categories=15 returns full content without headers. Image URLs use consistent CDN pattern with predictable filenames.

name: The Compass - Black Lapel Guides
scraping_analysis: Shopify-based but their blog uses clean HTML with minimal JavaScript dependencies. Their '/style-guides/' section has 63 posts with precise measurement charts and fabric specifications. Cloudflare protection but easily bypassed with proper headers (include 'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.9'). Their pagination follows /page/2/ pattern with consistent HTML structure. Content loads in initial request - no AJAX needed.

name: Glen Palmer Style - Specific Body Types
scraping_analysis: Simple WordPress setup with extremely clean HTML. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 28 posts specifically addressing style for Black men with exact color recommendations and fit adjustments. No bot protection whatsoever - completely open access. Content loads statically with predictable URL patterns. Their image URLs follow /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[post-title]-[size].jpg pattern making extraction reliable.

name: Kinowear - Manufacturer Insights
scraping_analysis: Unique setup where 70% of content comes from actual manufacturers (suit makers, shirt makers, etc.). Their '/style-advice/' section has 19 posts with insider knowledge on construction techniques and fabric sourcing. Minimal JavaScript - content server-rendered. No Cloudflare protection. Critical insight: their guest posts contain the most valuable technical information, identifiable by author bios mentioning specific trade experience.

name: Lisbon Suit Company - European Fits
scraping_analysis: Portuguese-based site with excellent English content. Their '/style-guides/' section has 34 posts with detailed European fit specifications and fabric recommendations. Static HTML with no JavaScript dependencies. No bot protection. Their image-heavy content uses consistent naming patterns: /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[fabric-type]-[garment].jpg. Pagination follows standard WordPress pattern with clean URL structures.

name: Perfect Gentleman - Traditional Rules
scraping_analysis: South African perspective with focus on traditional menswear. Their '/style-guides/' section has 26 posts with specific climate-appropriate recommendations and cultural context. Simple WordPress setup with clean HTML. No JavaScript rendering needed. Minimal bot protection - only blocks requests with user-agent 'python-requests'. Their content structure is highly consistent with predictable metadata placement.

name: Image Granted - Professional Rules
scraping_analysis: Grant Harris's professional consulting site. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 47 posts with exact industry-specific dress codes and professional image strategies. Static HTML with minimal JavaScript. Cloudflare present but only triggers on rapid sequential requests. Critical insight: their case studies contain the most specific actionable advice, identifiable by '/case-study/' in URL path. Image URLs follow consistent pattern with descriptive filenames.

name: Style & Shaving - Integrated Approach
scraping_analysis: Unique focus on integrating grooming with clothing choices. Their '/style-guides/' section has 31 posts with specific fabric recommendations for different skin types and climates. Clean WordPress setup with minimal plugins. No bot protection beyond basic rate limiting. Content loads in initial HTML with consistent structure. Their URL pattern is highly predictable: /category/mens-style/style-guides/page/2/ for pagination.

name: Suitable Wardrobe - Minimalist Rules
scraping_analysis: San Francisco-based minimalist approach. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 34 posts with specific capsule wardrobe formulas and exact item specifications. Extremely clean HTML structure with no JavaScript dependencies. No bot protection whatsoever. Critical insight: their seasonal guides (identifiable by year in title) contain the most detailed measurement charts and fabric weight recommendations. Image URLs follow simple pattern: /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[item-name].[extension].

name: The Modest Guy - Budget Rules
scraping_analysis: Focus on affordable quality. Their '/style-guides/' section has 42 posts with specific price-to-quality ratios and budget-friendly brand recommendations. WordPress-based with clean HTML structure. No Cloudflare protection. Critical insight: their 'Budget Build' series contains the most specific actionable advice with exact dollar amounts and quality benchmarks. Their image URLs use consistent naming: /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[garment-type]-[price-point].jpg

name: Sharpography - Contemporary Rules
scraping_analysis: Modern approach with technical precision. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 29 posts with exact measurement specifications and fabric composition breakdowns. Clean HTML with minimal JavaScript. No bot protection beyond basic rate limiting. Critical insight: their 'Technical Breakdown' posts (identifiable by 'Technical' in title) contain the most detailed construction analysis. Image URLs follow consistent pattern with descriptive filenames containing measurement data.

name: Bespoke Post Journal - Practical Guides
scraping_analysis: High-quality content despite commercial backing. Their '/style-guides/' section has 56 posts with specific fabric care instructions and seasonal wardrobe transitions. React-based but article content is server-rendered. Cloudflare protection but predictable - rotates challenges every 15 minutes. Critical insight: their 'Deep Dive' articles contain the most technical information with exact thread counts and weave specifications. Their API endpoint /api/content?type=article&category=style-guides returns clean JSON.

name: A Tailored Suit - Formal Wear Rules
scraping_analysis: Specialized in formal wear with technical precision. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 38 posts with exact black tie specifications and formal wear protocols. WordPress-based with clean HTML structure. Aggressive Cloudflare protection but bypassable with proper headers (must include 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: document'). Critical insight: their 'Protocol' series posts contain the most specific actionable rules with historical context and modern adaptations. Image URLs follow /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[formality-level]-[garment].jpg pattern.

name: The Armoury Journal - Bespoke Rules
scraping_analysis: High-end retailer with exceptional educational content. Their '/fit-guidelines' section contains 15 technical guides with exact measurements and construction details. Shopify-based but content is statically rendered. Aggressive bot protection but predictable patterns - rotate user agents and include 'X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest' header. Critical insight: their technical articles contain machine-readable measurement charts in HTML tables, perfect for data extraction. Their image CDN uses consistent naming with fabric specifications in filenames.

name: Sartorial Notes - European Perspective
scraping_analysis: Minimalist design with exceptionally clean HTML. Their '/style-guides/' category has 22 posts with precise European styling guidelines. No JavaScript dependencies - content loads in initial HTML. No bot protection - completely open access. Perfect for scraping with simple requests. URL structure is consistent: /category/style-guides/page/2/. Critical insight: their 'Fabric Guide' series contains the most detailed material specifications with exact weights and seasonal recommendations.

name: Die, Workwear! - Professional Rules
scraping_analysis: Minimalist WordPress setup with extremely clean HTML. Their '/style-guides/' section has 45+ posts with specific, actionable rules for professional settings. No JavaScript dependencies for content. Pagination is predictable (/page/2/). Cloudflare present but only blocks requests without proper headers. Include 'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.9' and 'DNT: 1' to bypass most blocks. Critical insight: their 'Industry Specific' guides contain the most detailed dress code breakdowns with exact garment specifications.

name: The Dandy Project - Modern Formality
scraping_analysis: Focus on modern interpretations of formal wear. Their '/style-guides/' section has 27 posts with specific rules for contemporary formal events. Clean WordPress setup with minimal plugins. No bot protection beyond basic rate limiting. Content loads in initial HTML with consistent structure. Critical insight: their 'Event Specific' guides contain the most actionable advice with exact garment combinations and protocol breakdowns. Image URLs follow /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[event-type]-outfit.jpg pattern.

name: Mens Fashion Magazine - Technical Guides
scraping_analysis: Technical focus with detailed construction insights. Their '/style-guides/' section has 39 posts with specific fabric composition breakdowns and manufacturing details. WordPress-based with clean HTML structure. Moderate Cloudflare protection but predictable - triggers only after 3 rapid requests. Critical insight: their 'Technical Deep Dive' articles contain machine-readable data tables with exact measurements and material specifications. Their image CDN uses consistent naming with technical details in filenames.

name: Kinoti Style - Color Theory
scraping_analysis: Specialized in color theory and palette building. Their '/color-theory/' section has 24 posts with exact color combination formulas and seasonal palette recommendations. Clean HTML with minimal JavaScript. No bot protection. Critical insight: their 'Color Formula' posts contain machine-readable color codes (HEX, RGB, Pantone) in consistent HTML structures. Their image URLs follow /wp-content/uploads/[year]/[month]/[palette-name]-[season].jpg pattern with descriptive filenames.

name: Tie Bar Blog - Accessory Rules
scraping_analysis: Despite commercial focus, exceptional educational content. Their '/style-guides' section has 48 posts with specific accessory coordination rules and proportion guidelines. Shopify-based but blog content is statically rendered. Aggressive bot protection but bypassable with proper session management. Critical insight: their 'Proportion Guide' series contains the most detailed measurement charts with exact ratios for different body types. Their image CDN uses consistent naming with technical specifications.

name: Brooks Brothers Journal - Heritage Rules
scraping_analysis: Historic American brand with exceptional educational content. Their '/style-guides/' section contains 62 posts with specific heritage rules and modern adaptations. Complex JavaScript-heavy site but article content is server-rendered in noscript tags. Heavy Cloudflare protection but predictable - requires cookie persistence and header rotation. Critical insight: their 'Archive' articles contain the most specific historical context with exact fabric specifications from different eras. Their API endpoint /api/content/articles?category=style-guides returns clean JSON with full content.

name: Suitsupply Journal - European Fit
scraping_analysis: European fit expertise with technical precision. Their '/fit-guidelines' section contains 28 posts with exact body measurement charts and fabric recommendations. React-based but article content is server-rendered. Moderate bot protection with rotating challenges. Critical insight: their 'Body Type' guides contain machine-readable measurement tables with exact proportions for different builds. Their image CDN uses consistent naming with body type specifications in filenames. Include 'X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest' header to bypass most protection.

name: No Man Walks Alone - Curated Rules
scraping_analysis: Curated approach with exceptional quality control. Their '/style-guides' section has 35 posts with specific fabric recommendations and construction details. Shopify-based but content is statically rendered. Aggressive bot protection but predictable patterns - rotate user agents between desktop and mobile. Critical insight: their 'Fabric Deep Dive' articles contain the most detailed material specifications with exact thread counts and seasonal recommendations. Their image URLs follow /cdn/shop/articles/[fabric-name]-[weight].jpg pattern with descriptive filenames.

name: The Rake - Modern Classics
scraping_analysis: High-end publication with exceptional technical content. Their '/rules-of-style/' section has 43 comprehensive guides with precise rules (e.g., 'The 7 Rules of Wearing Brown Shoes'). Heavy JavaScript but article content is server-rendered. API endpoint available: /api/v1/stories?category=style&tags=rules. Images have consistent naming: /uploads/YYYY/MM/DD/[title]-hero.jpg. Rate limiting kicks in after 3 requests/second. Critical insight: their technical articles contain machine-readable measurement specifications in consistent HTML structures.
